com.example.micka.demosalefinder

Class CustomMarkerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.micka.demosalefinder.CustomMarkerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter

    public class CustomMarkerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter
    Creates customized info window for Map activity and connects marker and info window together.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomMarkerAdapter(Context context)
      Public constructor which is called from MapAcitivity to convert customized XML info window into a view which appears in MapActivity.

    • Method Detail

      • getInfoWindow

        public View getInfoWindow(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Interface method which is called first when a marker is tapped. Calls setContentInMarker and returns the updated info window. If null, it will call getInfoContents().
        Specified by:
        getInfoWindow in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter

      • getInfoContents

        public View getInfoContents(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Interface method which is called if getInfoWindow returns null. If this method return null, a default info window will be generetad and shown in Map acitivty.
        Specified by:
        getInfoContents in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter

      • getInfoTitle

        public java.lang.String getInfoTitle()
        Is called from Map activity and returns title of info window content.
